meanings.definition: A container or case for holding tools.
meanings.sent1: My dad keeps his hammer and nails in the toolbox.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic grabbed his toolbox before working on the car.
meanings.sent3: The toolbox looked like it was yawning when I opened it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a toolbox full of knowledge waiting to be used.
meanings.sent5: The shiny red toolbox gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A set of tools kept in a box or chest.
meanings.sent1: She organized her toolbox with precision, each tool in its place.
meanings.sent2: The handyman's toolbox was heavy with all the necessary equipment.
meanings.sent3: The toolbox seemed to whisper 'pick me' every time I passed by.
meanings.sent4: His words were the tools in his emotional toolbox.
meanings.sent5: The old wooden toolbox smelled of sawdust and memories.
